metadata.title: CVE-2010-3702 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
The Gfx::getPos function in the PDF parser in xpdf before 3.02pl5, poppler 0.8.7 and possibly other versions up to 0.15.1, CUPS, kdegraphics, and possibly other products allows context-dependent attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) via unknown vectors that trigger an uninitialized pointer dereference.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2010-3702` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-poppler-0.18 - 0.16.0-0ubuntu2
libpoppler-cpp0v5 - 0.16.0-0ubuntu2
libpoppler-glib8 - 0.16.0-0ubuntu2
libpoppler-qt5-1 - 0.16.0-0ubuntu2
libpoppler111 - 0.16.0-0ubuntu2
poppler-utils - 0.16.0-0ubuntu2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ipe package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
libextractor package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
poppler package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.16.0-0ubuntu2').
